hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #2# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Lobby Right Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Goron Pot's happy face# spits out #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Bottom of the Well#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that Great Fairies outside #Hyrule and Ganon's castles# reward...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #5# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Haunted Wasteland torches# reveal #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Are you sure you want to play this? Wanna go get some tacos or something?

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #spider under a block in the Fire Temple# holds #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ GS Skull On Fire

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Bottom of the Well#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #Goron City#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Epona's Song#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Falling Ceiling Room Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Lens of Truth# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #an Ice Trap#.
